package.description: Open URI in browser if server under debugging is ready.
package.debug.server.ready.serverReadyAction.des: Act upon a URI when a server program under debugging is ready (indicated by sending output of the form 'listening on port 3000' or 'Now listening on: https://localhost:5001' to the debug console.)
package.debug.server.ready.action.description: What to do with the URI when the server is ready.
package.debug.server.ready.action.openExternally: Open URI externally with the default application.
package.debug.server.ready.action.debugWithChrom: Start debugging with the 'Debugger for Chrome'.
package.debug.server.ready.pattern.description: Server is ready if this pattern appears on the debug console. The first capture group must include a URI or a port number.
package.debug.server.ready.uriFormat.description: A format string used when constructing the URI from a port number. The first '%s' is substituted with the port number.
package.debug.server.ready.webRoot.description: Value passed to the debug configuration for the 'Debugger for Chrome'.

dist/extension.server.ready.nocapture.error: Format uri ('{0}') uses a substitution placeholder but pattern did not capture anything.
dist/extension.server.ready.placeholder.error: Format uri ('{0}') must contain exactly one substitution placeholder.
